name: BuildMoreCubes
description: It is an army vs army game.You need to constantly rebuild and grow your army in order to survive or win the battle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Generic sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 - 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550Ti or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Generic sound card

reviews.review_text: I have edited my review.   the current release of the game is still a bit buggy, However the dev has finally responded, and fixes for the full screen crash will come soon, along with a few for units getting stuck in terrain  The game can get a bit frustrating still, especailly if you do manage to grow a large army and get wiped out in seconds. There are some tactics to the game. I'ts not a bad game, hopefully once the issues have been fully addressed, it will make for a better game.
